Title: The Sum of All Fears
Writer: Tom Clancy (novel), Paul Attanasio (screenplay), Daniel Pyne (screenplay)
Actors: Ian Mongrain, Russell Bobbitt, James Cromwell, Ken Jenkins
Plot: CIA analyst Jack Ryan must stop the plans of a Neo Nazis faction that threatens to induce a catastrophic conflict between the United States and Russia's newly elected president by detonating a nuclear weapon at a football game in Baltimore.
